sentence.Network_en: Benedict had been a wild boy and a quarrelsome young man.
sentence.Network_cn: 贝内迪克特小时候野性难驯，年轻时又爱与人争吵。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语常用词缀 - 豆丁网 ... zealous 热心的) - quarrelsome 好争论的) meddlesome 好干涉的) -.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... burdensome 沉重的 quarrelsome 好争吵的 lonesome 孤独的.
2008年1月的SAT真题解析-sat阅读培训-教育联展网 ... disaffected 不满的不忠的 quarrelsome 喜欢争吵的 sentimental 多愁善感的.
... offensive 讨厌的，无礼的 quarrelsome 爱争吵的 spiteful 怀恨的，恶意的.

list.abs: 转载，~学习~“地道的英... ... 17. 捂着肚子 clutch one's stomach 18. 火药味（儿） quarrelsome tone 20. （脸部、面容）扭曲 contort.
He has a quarrelsome disposition ., 他生性爱吵架.
A quarrelsome man has no good neighbours ., 好争吵者无好邻居.
quarrelsome dogs get dirty coat .好斗的狗不会有好皮毛.

entry.tran: 好吵架的;喜欢争吵的；好争论的
entry.def: A quarrelsome person often gets involved in arguments.

example.ex: Benedict had been a wild boy and a quarrelsome young man.
example.tran: 贝内迪克特小时候野性难驯，年轻时又爱与人争吵。

auth_sentence.content: A witty talker, he was also said to be hot-tempered and quarrelsome.
auth_sentence.res_content: A witty talker, he was also said to be hot-tempered and quarrelsome.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A witty talker, he was also said to be hot-tempered and quarrelsome.

auth_sentence.content: In a quarrelsome, voluble region, Syria is a strangely muted place.
auth_sentence.res_content: In a quarrelsome, voluble region, Syria is a strangely muted place.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In a quarrelsome, voluble region, Syria is a strangely muted place.

auth_sentence.content: Michael Beard is rackety, quarrelsome, competitive, greedy, ambitious, politicking.
auth_sentence.res_content: Michael Beard is rackety, quarrelsome, competitive, greedy, ambitious, politicking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Michael Beard is rackety, quarrelsome, competitive, greedy, ambitious, politicking.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,"充满……的,具有……倾向"

stems_affixes.word_buile: frolic嬉戏的,欢乐的+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.快活的,欢乐的
loath不情愿的,勉强的+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.可憎的,令人作呕的
lone孤独的,独立的+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.寂寞的
meddle管闲事+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.爱管闲事的
mettle勇气+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.精神抖擞的
noi臭+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.恶臭的,令人不快的
quarrel吵架+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.喜欢吵架的,好争论的
win赢得+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.媚人的,漂亮的

sentences.en: The boy is quarrelsome and ready to fight at the drop of a hat.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩爱吵嘴，动不动就打架。
